aboutUsText: This application is a simple dhikr application that provides a collection of dhikrs for morning and evening. It is designed to help users remember and recite dhikrs easily.
aboutTheDeveloper: This application is developed by Ahmad The SWE, a software developer committed to creating useful and user-friendly applications. If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us.
setYourAlarmsText: You can set alarms to remind you of dhikr time
morningAlarmNotificationBody: It's time to read the morning dhikr!
eveningAlarmNotificationBody: It's time to read the evening dhikr!
